title: [Large-scale] Online Language Lecture Quality Evaluation Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of online learning environments and language instruction experience
context.additional_context: Microlearning Modules for Professionals to Learn via Mobile Devices Outside Work Hours. Cultivating Practical Application Skills Through Project-Based Assessment

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core domains (instructional design, assessment methods, usability, interactivity, technology integration) of an online language course quality evaluation checklist
Learners can analyze actual language course content using provided evaluation tools and derive at least three improvement points
Learners can collaboratively write and present team proposals for online course quality improvement strategies through peer evaluation

resources: Digital collaboration tools (Padlet, Google Forms, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
